settings.title: Caviar Gift Cards - sophistication in simple things
settings.text:
• Buy Caviar Gift Cards and get premium quality caviar at best prices with free overnight shipping in the US
  • Don't know how to surprise your friends, coworkers, boss? Can't think of a wedding gift? Don't know how to thank them for a favor? - We have come up with a great solution!

settings.title: Caviar Gift Cards
settings.subtitlle: Searching for an impressive present for a one-of-a-kind person for a special occasion? Consider a caviar gift card from Bester Caviar — an elegant declaration of love, an unusual ticket to a new experience, or a vivid sign of showing respect.

settings.title: A GIFT FOR ALL OCCASIONS: FROM THANK YOUS TO WEDDINGS
settings.left_text: We understand that the perfect gift transcends the ordinary. That's why our exquisite caviar offerings make for a remarkable present, suitable for a wide range of occasions. Whether you want to express gratitude, celebrate a milestone, or add a touch of elegance to weddings and special events, caviar gift cards are the answer
settings.right_text: They allow your recipients to select their preferred caviar from our premium offerings and caviar subscription program, ensuring a personalized and memorable experience. Caviar gift sets are a tasteful way to show appreciation, and they will definitely highlight you as a thoughtful and extravagant gift giver.

settings.title: stay in touch!
settings.sub_title: Sing up for special offers and news form BEST CAVIAR

settings.title: FREE OVERNIGHT DELIVERY
settings.text: Free Overnight Shipping in temperature controlled coolers for perishable goods Monday through Thursday & Same Day Free Delivery in Miami 24/7.

settings.title: PERSONALIZE YOUR ORDER WITH A GIFT CARD
settings.text: Send someone special Bester Caviar Gift Card so they can receive their fresh caviar when they are ready to indulge.

settings.title: 24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
settings.text: Contact our caviar concierge to help you with your customized selection & delivery details: +1(813)510-9892 inna@besterusa.com

settings.title: AMAZON’S CHOICE
settings.text: Bester Caviar is best selling caviar brand on Amazon with over 500 positive customer reviews and Amazon’s Choice award: highly rated & well priced, ready to ship immediately.

settings.title: More and more quality service for our customers
settings.text: We work hard to make the caviar experience an exciting, satisfying event for you and your loved ones. Order caviar from us and enjoy the marvelous taste of top-class roes!

settings.title: The Caviar Club
settings.text: The Caviar Club’s goal is to make caviar more available while offering uncompromised high quality and great service to its members. The Caviar Club is created for caviar lovers who would like to enjoy caviar monthly without overpaying for it. As a member of the club, you receive the best wholesale prices on premium quality black caviar and other perks such as free gifts for the finest caviar experience. Make caviar tasting your monthly habit!
settings.sub_title: Excellence Found Only at BEST CAVIAR
